"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import Navbar from "./NavBar" const LandingPage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [selectedRole, setSelectedRole] = useState(null) const handleNext = () => { if (selectedRole === "patient") { navigate("/signin") } else if (selectedRole === "practitioner") { navigate("/practitioner/signin") } } return (
MedSync

Select your role

Welcome to MedSync, your integrated healthcare platform. Choose your role to access personalized features and services designed specifically for your needs.

) } export default LandingPage
